metadata.title: CVE-2024-27408 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:dmaengine: dw-edma: eDMA: Add sync read before starting the DMA transfer inremote setup The Linked list element and pointer are not stored in the samememory as the eDMA controller register. If the doorbell register is toggledbefore the full write of the linked list a race condition error will occur.In remote setup we can only use a readl to the memory to assure the fullwrite has occurred.
